meanings.definition: A type of pasta in the form of long, flat ribbons.
meanings.sent1: I cooked fettucini for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served delicious fettucini with marinara sauce.
meanings.sent3: My cat played with the fettucini noodles, thinking they were toys.
meanings.sent4: The sunlight streaming through the window looked like golden fettucini.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of boiling fettucini filled the kitchen with warmth.

meanings.definition: A dish made with fettucini pasta, typically served with a creamy sauce.
meanings.sent1: She ordered fettucini Alfredo at the Italian restaurant.
meanings.sent2: The creamy fettucini dish was a hit at the potluck.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally spilled the fettucini sauce on his apron.
meanings.sent4: The fettucini dish was a comforting hug in a bowl.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the fettucini dish made my mouth water.
